# change the content of configuration.properties as following:
path = share1
port = 9000
advertisedName = localhost
peers = none
maximumIncommingConnections = 10
blockSize = 1
syncInterval = 60

udpPort = 10000
mod = udp
timeout = 5
retry = 3

clientPort=11000
authorized_keys=ssh-rsa  aaron@krusty

# run the bitbox using:
java -cp bitbox.jar unimelb.bitbox.Peer

# change the content of configuration.properties as following:
path = share2
port = 9001
advertisedName = localhost
peers = localhost:10000
maximumIncommingConnections = 10
blockSize = 1
syncInterval = 60

udpPort = 10001
mod = udp
timeout = 5
retry = 3

clientPort=11001
authorized_keys=ssh-rsa  aaron@krusty

# run the bitbox using:
java -cp bitbox.jar unimelb.bitbox.Peer

# change content in share1 and share2, they are synchronized
